table.caption: Glorium Adventures
rows: The town's deceased warriors rise to fight again as {@creature Ghost||ghosts}, but their resurgence creates headaches when the spirit of Flatnose Grim expects to be reinstated as the town's ruler.
After an argument with Tyrza, Jek Thanol refuses to shield Glorium from the armies of Gzemnid. With their treaty shattered, a {@creature death tyrant} attacks the gate-town.

A {@creature frost giant} jarl learns of the entrance to the World Tree within {@book Serpent's Rise|SatO|3|Serpent's Rise}. Rather than attack Glorium, he sets out to find the root and use it to conquer untold worlds.
A {@creature sea hag} in the {@book Sacred Well|SatO|3|Sacred Well} tells one of the characters they will die at the hand of Gzemnid in five days.
